title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ami Horowitz & Herschel Walker | 6/4/20
description:
Filmmaker Ami Horowitz talked to protesters and found that many actually justified violence. Trump’s use of the Insurrection Act is not as uncalled for as the media wants us to believe. Former football star Herschel Walker has had enough of Democrats pushing division and rioting. He gives his thoughts on the riots, the police, Drew Brees' apology, and what we can do to heal our nation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
